title: Embedded Task Support Training for Strengthening Information Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic information retrieval and problem-solving procedures
context.additional_context: A mobile-based long-term course for in-service elementary educators to systematically develop information problem-solving skills in social studies. Learners flexibly study and complete tasks using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can apply an information problem-solving framework to systematically analyze and resolve complex social issues
Learners can evaluate and integrate diverse information sources to propose evidence-based solutions
Learners can design information problems encountered in real educational settings as projects and develop implementation plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
